title: Kara Tointon shops for pumpkins at farmers' market with baby son Frey
text:
She's been relishing the joys of parenthood with fiancé Marius Jensen since welcoming their first child in November last year.

And Kara Tointon was every inch the doting mother as she treated her son Frey, 11 months, to a trip to the farmers' market along Portobello Road, west London, on Monday morning.

The former EastEnders actress, 36, appeared to be preparing for Halloween as she was pictured shopping for fresh pumpkins while strolling her baby along in a pushchair by Cybex.

Halloween prep: Kara Tointon was every inch the doting mother as she treated her son Frey, 11 months, to a trip to the farmers' market along Portobello Road, west London, on Monday

Opting for a dressed down appearance, the soap star sported a brown fluffy coat, tied in with skinny jeans.

The media personality wrapped up against the chilly climes of the English capital in a grey scarf and kept cosy in sturdy black boots.

With her tresses styled into a tousled bun, Kara shielded her eyes behind a pair of classic sunglasses and went make-up free.

Low-key: The ex-EastEnders star, 36, appeared to be preparing for the annual celebration as she shopped for pumpkins while strolling her baby along in a pushchair by Cybex

Keeping warm: Opting for a dressed down appearance, the soap star sported a brown fluffy coat, tied in with skinny jeans

Kara and Marius welcomed son Frey together in November last year, after first being spotted together as a couple a year earlier.

The pair spoke about the birth of their son in an interview with Hello! as they described the dramatic moment Kara was rushed into theatre for an emergency Caesarean section after their baby's heartbeat dropped.

Actress Kara explained: 'Like everything in life, what you expect to happen, more often than not, doesn't. It did become quite dramatic and a bit frightening. I was in an episode of ER at that point. It all happened incredibly quickly.

'There is a nine-month build and then you meet your baby and instantly they are engraved in your mind. Suddenly you know them deeper than anyone while having only just met.'

Effortlessly chic: The media personality wrapped up against the chilly climes of the English capital in a grey scarf and kept cosy in sturdy black boots

Naturally radiant: With her tresses styled into a tousled bun, Kara shielded her eyes behind a pair of classic sunglasses and went make-up free

Kara - who keeps her personal life relatively private - recently revealed she and Marius are toying with the idea of getting married in his native Norway next year.

During a recent episode of Lorraine, the honey-blonde beauty said: 'Well, (the wedding) is in the schedule.

'Do we do it in Norway? That would be nice, but it’s getting everyone over there. Yeah, it’s in the plan.'

They were reported to be engaged in March 2018, however the TV star never confirmed or denied if they were set to tie the knot at the time.

Family first: She's been relishing the joys of parenthood with fiancé Marius Jensen since welcoming their first child in November last year (Marius and Frey pictured in August)
description: The former EastEnders actress, 36, was every inch the doting mother as she treated her son Frey, 11 months, to a trip to the farmers' market along Portobello Road, west London, on Monday.
